sen.j: 大和五条藩（やまとごじょうはん）は、大和国（現在の奈良県五條市二見）に存在した藩。
sen.e: Yamato Gojo domain was located in Yamato Province (present-day Futami, Gojo City, Nara Prefecture).
Yamato Gojo Domain was a feudal domain that was located in Yamato Province (present-day Futami, Gojo City, Nara Prefecture).
sen.cmt: Domain を大文字にしました。
sen.e: Yamato Gojo Domain was a feudal domain that was located in Yamato Province (present-day Futami, Gojo City, Nara Prefecture).

sen.j: 別名に五條藩、五條二見藩（ごじょうふたみはん）とも。
sen.e: The domain is also known as Gojo domain or Gojo-futami domain
The domain is also known as Gojo Domain or Gojo Futami Domain
sen.cmt: Domain を大文字にしました。
sen.e: The domain is also known as Gojo Domain or Gojo Futami Domain

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 松倉重信は筒井順慶のもとで、島左近と共に筒井氏の片腕と呼ばれた名将であった。
sen.e: Shigenobu MATSUKURA was a renown military commander alongside Sakon SHIMA, who served Junkei Tsutsui.
Shigenobu MATSUKURA was a renown military commander alongside Sakon SHIMA, who served Junkei Tsutsui.
Shigenobu MATSUKURA was a renown military commander alongside Sakon SHIMA, who served Junkei Tsutsui.

sen.j: 重信の死後、松倉氏は子の松倉重政が継ぐ。
sen.e: After Shigenobu's death, the family name was inherited by his son Shigemasa MATSUKURA.
After Shigenobu's death, the Matsukura clan was inherited by his son Shigemasa MATSUKURA.
sen.cmt: 松倉氏→Matsukura clan としました。
sen.e: After Shigenobu's death, the Matsukura clan was inherited by his son Shigemasa MATSUKURA.

sen.j: 順慶の死後、重政は筒井氏を離れ浪人となる。
sen.e: After Junkei's death, Shigemasa left the Tsutsui clan and became lordless.
After Junkei's death, Shigemasa left the Tsutsui clan and became lordless.
After Junkei's death, Shigemasa left the Tsutsui clan and became lordless.

sen.j: 関ヶ原の戦いで重政は徳川家康に味方して軍功を挙げたことから、戦後に五條1万石を与えられ、ここに五條藩が立藩した。
sen.e: In the Battle of Sekigahara, Shigemasa allied with Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and achieved victories in the battlefield, thus receiving the 10,000-koku Gojo district after the war and founding the Gojo domain.

In the Battle of Sekigahara, Shigemasa allied with Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and achieved victories in the battlefield, thus receiving the Gojo district of 10,000 koku (an unit of assessed crop yields of the land [1 koku: about 180 liter], which was also used to express the size of the land) after the war and founding the Gojo Domain.
sen.cmt: Domain を大文字にしました。石（koku) 補足を追加しました。
sen.e: In the Battle of Sekigahara, Shigemasa allied with Ieyasu TOKUGAWA and achieved victories in the battlefield, thus receiving the Gojo district of 10,000 koku (an unit of assessed crop yields of the land [1 koku: about 180 liter], which was also used to express the size of the land) after the war and founding the Gojo Domain.

sen.j: 重政は城下町づくりや諸役免除など、藩政の確立に尽力して商業町としての五條藩を作りだした。
sen.e: Shigemasa worked on castle town development and granted exemptions from various duties, aiding in building domain rule and growth of Gojo domain as a commercial town.
Shigemasa made efforts in the establishment of the domain rule by developing its castle town and granting exemptions from various duties, and helped Gojo Domain become a commercial town.
sen.cmt: 一部表現を変更しました。
sen.e: Shigemasa made efforts in the establishment of the domain rule by developing its castle town and granting exemptions from various duties, and helped Gojo Domain become a commercial town.

sen.j: 重政は大坂の陣においても徳川家康に味方して軍功を挙げたため、元和 (日本)2年（1616年）に肥前島原藩4万3000石に加増移封され、五条藩は廃藩となった。
sen.e: Shigemasa again made military contributions under Ieyasu in the Siege of Osaka and was promoted and transferred to Bizen Shimabara domain with 43,000 koku, leading to the closer of Gojo domain.

Since Shigemasa again made military contributions under Ieyasu in the Siege of Osaka, he was promoted and transferred to Bizen Shimabara Domain with 43,000 koku in 1616, leading to the closure of Gojo Domain.
sen.cmt: 一部表現を変更しました。1616年 を追加しました。
sen.e: Since Shigemasa again made military contributions under Ieyasu in the Siege of Osaka, he was promoted and transferred to Bizen Shimabara Domain with 43,000 koku in 1616, leading to the closure of Gojo Domain.

Tozama (outside) lordship
Tozama daimyo (nonhereditary feudal lord)
sen.cmt: 外様大名 補足を変更しました。
sen.e: Tozama daimyo (nonhereditary feudal lord)
10,000 koku rice yield
10,000 koku
sen.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。
sen.e: 10,000 koku
